document.full_text: raffi torres ended an ugly stanley cup finals opener with a dramatic flash, scoring the games only goal with 18.5 seconds left to play to give vancouver a 1-0 series lead.
document.title: canucks 1, bruins 0: canucks score once and late, but it's enough to beat bruins
lines_and_colors: raffi torres ended an ugly stanley cup finals opener with a dramatic flash, scoring the games only goal with 18.5 seconds left to play to give vancouver a 1-0 series lead.
